contentOwner.description: A list of lab content owner Microsoft aliases

maximumParticipants.description: Maximum number of participants (based on content, structure, limitations, etc)

groupSize.description: If using groups, define the size of each group

requiredRetention.description: Expected retention for lab resources in days

requiredRegion.description: If a specific Azure region is required, specify by name

requiredQuota.description: A list of required resource quotas. Find the quota name with Get-AzQuota. The lab will check before deployment that the student lab has available quota. For example: ['standardEav6Family',2]

identityType.description: The identity required for the lab students

deploymentPermissions.description: Permissions required to deploy the lab if other than contributor at the resource group scope

deploymentProcedure.description: Detailed steps to deploy the lab

cleanupProcedure.description: Detailed steps to clean up the lab
